thread.title: This candy sorting machine isn’t the hero the world wants but it’s the hero the world needs
thread.title_full: This candy sorting machine isn’t the hero the world wants but it’s the hero the world needs

author: Pollyanna
title: This candy sorting machine isn’t the hero the world wants but it’s the hero the world needs
text:
Odd & Funny Home » Technology » Gadgets » This candy sorting machine isn’t the hero the world wants but it’s the hero the world needs 
By John Biggs 
War. Famine. Drought. Imagine Dragons. The world is full of horror and what better way to assuage that grief then by watching this M&M and Skittles sorting machine do its amazing work in real time. Created by Willem Pennings the system is surprisingly robust and very well made. You can pour unsorted M&Ms into the top of the machine and a little nozzle spits out sorted candies into… Read More 
Read more here:: techcrunch.com – gadgets Rate this post
